title: The Growing Potential of Cannabis
description: As industrial use grows, medicinal use expands, and laws are changed, the investment potential for cannabis merits serious attention, says Arcview Group CEO Kim Kovacs.
itunes:author: Barron's Advisor
itunes:summary: As industrial use grows, medicinal use expands, and laws are changed, the investment potential for cannabis merits serious attention, says Arcview Group CEO Kim Kovacs.
content:encoded: As industrial use grows, medicinal use expands, and laws are changed, the investment potential for cannabis merits serious attention, says Arcview Group CEO Kim Kovacs.
